name: blm-parser
author: Bryce Morrow
description: .blm files are a real estate specific file format developed by Rightmove, a British-based company that runs www.rightmove.co.uk, an online real estate portal. The format definition is available at http://www.rightmove.co.uk/ps/pdf/guides/RightmoveDatafeedFormatV3iOVS_1.5.pdf. It is essentially just a specialized csv format. The module input is the file path of a .blm file and the output of the module is a json object containing the property value mappings as defined by the file.
